price: Da waɗansu mutãne* daga gare su, ba su i da riskuwa da sũ ba, alhãli kuwa shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.
arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: * Su ne Ajamãwan da zã su musulunta su bi Annabi tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi. Kõ kuwa duk wanda ya musulunta a bãyan sahabban Annabi. Wannan yanã nunã falalar sahabbai a kan waɗansunsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waākharīna min'hum lammā yalḥaqū bihim wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
